verses.roman:
tṛtīya ślokete kari vastura nirdeśa
yāhā ha-ite jāni para-tattvera uddeśa

synonyms: tṛtīya ślokete—in the third verse; kari—I make; vastura—of the object; nirdeśa—indication; yāhā ha-ite—from which; jāni—I understand; para-tattvera—of the Absolute Truth; uddeśa—identification.
translation: In the third verse I indicate the Absolute Truth, who is the ultimate substance. With such a description, one can visualize the Supreme Truth.
